original_text: The Levites carried God's Covenant Box with its poles on their shoulders. That is how God had commanded Moses that they should carry it.
korean_text: 모세가 여호와의 말씀을 따라 명령한 대로 레위 자손이 채에 하나님의 궤를 꿰어 어깨에 메니라

sentences.original_text: The Levites carried God's Covenant Box
with its poles on their shoulders
That is how God had commanded Moses
